content: worsted weight yarn 23 oz white worsted weight yarn 5 oz soft navy worsted weight yarn size g crochet hook or size needed for proper gauge tapestry needle block assembly using tapestry needle and appropriate color yarn and stitching through blo assemble each individual block using the diagram below for placement 12 blocks total required color key white soft navy burgundy fiesta burgundy afghan assembly using tapestry needle and appropriate color yarn and stitching through blo assemble the 12 completed blocks into a grid 3 blocks wide by 4 blocks long see cover photo border round 1 with burgundy or burgundy fiesta © yarn join with a slip_stitch to any corner chain 1 space single_crochet around work 3 single_crochet in each corner chain 1 space join with slip_stitch to first single_crochet to join round 2 chain 3 turn double_crochet in each single_crochet around work 3 double_crochet in each corner join with slip_stitch to top of beg chain 3 to join round 3 chain 1 turn single_crochet in each double_crochet around work 3 single_crochet in each corner join with slip_stitch to first single_crochet to join finish off weave in loose ends every effort has been made to ensure the accuracy of these instructions we cannot be responsible for human error differences in individual stitching techniques or typographical errors copyright 2001 c l halvorson
